dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, July 01, 2005 3:53 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; jester@truehustler.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement
Date: Fri, 1 Jul 2005 14:39:03 -0400
From: <jester@truehustler.com>
Reply-To: jester@truehustler.com
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Hello,

 A client of yours is Infringing on work that is located on my site.
there URL is http://www.newerapimpin.com/ and the work that is being
Infringed is http://www.newerapimpin.com/Untitled-1.png

The work was done by a close friend of mine and is extremely mad about this
the original image can be found here http://truehustler.com I would hope
that you have something done about that asap. So i do not have to submit a
DMCA and get this all out of hand. I called the person on the domain contact
information and they said they where going to take it down and have yet to
do so. I read the planets TOS and see that they do not permit the use of
copywrited material on there servers.

Hope this can be settled. Thanks, Anthony Gaston. Owner of Truehustler.com.

- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCxa0rvK/XpJs6oyURAu/dAJ9ABZpNC6qCmlnvsDzfBbFnY+rRzgCfT5Hl
iIgdJoe3J9XTxz8A5V3Dl3I=
=Gdyf
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
